text: If I could rate lower than a 1 Star I would. I am LIVID with this company and could care less. I have arranged multiple call backs with this automated fictional character who replies to the reviews to claim to want to be able to resolve the problem. Hasn't happened. My stimulus check was rejected. I haven't been able to use by debit card at the ATM ever, my card declines transactions frequently. I would have closed this account but my stimulus payment was being deposited and the IRS said if I closed it I may not get it until June. Go Figure. MoneyLion is a big deception! Don't fool with this company.
title: If I could rate lower than a 1 Star I…

text:
DO NOT USE!

Do not use MoneyLion to rebuild your credit.

1 - They're not even reporting my payments to any credit agency. I've seen no change in scores, and I've checked my reports, they are not reporting.

2 - I called them to have my bank account information changed so they could take the usual monthly payment. I was assured over the phone the upcoming payment would be removed from the new account. Instead they took it from wrong account and overdrafted my account.

When I contacted them I was told that it takes 2 -3 days for those changes to go through and because of that, they weren't going to credit me the NSF. 

When I explained that the rep I spoke to AND the documentation on their website did not indicate this, they thanked me for the feedback and still refused to credit the NSF fee. I'm now out $70 in the middle of a pandemic when money is incredibly tight because of a lack of communication. Beyond furious.

3 - Their $20 membership fee is BS and pretty much a money grab. There is nothing inside of the moneylion app that will help you that you can't get from a site like WalletHub or Credit Karma. 

So to recap the credit building is a lie. Membership fees are a scam. They're are greedy as hell and refuse to simply do the right hing based on a mistake THEY MADE.

If you need quick cash use an app like DAVE. Dave is wonderful! Moneylion is a joke.I was in a desperate situation and needed the cash and I regret this deeply. Don't make my mistake, DO NOT USE MONEYLION.
title: DO NOT USE!

text: If I can give this company negative stars, I would. Please do not sign up for this company. This company is meant to help your credit, but it hurt my credit really severely. The app and customer service really didn't help at all. I was trying to make a payment in January, but the app wouldn't allow me. Call the Customer Service, and they put tickets in and made the matter worst. They dinged my credit and said they were going to help. Also, my payment was due on March 31, 2020, the amount didn't come out from my bank the time they wanted to take it out, but I went in and made the payment on another card on the same date, they still said I was late, and they ding my credit. This company is the worst. Please do not sign up for this company. They ruin my credit score. I'm looking into filing a class action against them.
title: If I can give this company negative…

title: They are a rip off

text:
This is my first time writing a review, so this is serious. I am livid! I took out a $500 credit builder loan with MoneyLion In November. $125 was deposited into my account. I set up automatic payments so I would never miss a payment and all payments would be in time. They took out $9.91/week for the loan, as well as $4.90/week for the membership from my bank account. I tried to pay it off in February, something went wrong because they never initiated the transaction. I had over $3000 in my account, there shouldn’t have been an issue, but ok. I figured I’d just continue with the weekly payments because it's helping with my credit, right? After the failed payoff, I received notifications from my bank like clockwork every Friday that a payment has been transferred to MoneyLion. I thought everything was fine, Up until 4/11/2020 when I received a credit monitoring notification that my payment was over 30 DAY LATE!!! I opened the app and sure enough, no loan payment was taken out after the failed payoff payment. I called customer care to see what was going on. They said that the failed payment canceled the automatic payment. Those payments were for the membership only. Are you freakin’ kidding me?! WELL, WHY THE HECK  DIDN’T MONEYLION SEND ME A FREAKIN’ NOTIFICATION?!?! HOW THE F*$k AM I SUPPOSED TO KNOW THAT?!?! Send a notification, an email, a letter, SOMETHING letting me know what was going on. Again, I set all my bills on automatic payment because I don’t want to miss or be late with my payments. I’m trying to build my credit not destroy it. Up until then, my payment history was 100% with no derogatory marks on my credit report, now my credit score took a hit with from this fiasco. I said F*$k it, I’m paying this off, I need to be done with MoneyLion. I paid it off on 4/11/2020, they took the money out of my account on 4/14/2020. I called customer care to see why my money wasn’t released from escrow, they said that it takes 5 days to process. Then an extra 5 days for me to transfer it to my bank account...Seriously?! That’s bulls*$t! Why do I have to wait 10 days to get my money?! I can’t even cancel my membership because my loan “Isn’t paid off”, even though they took the money from my account. I just want to be done with them. STAY AWAY FROM MONEYLION!!!! 

Quick note for MoneyLion: Inform your customers if a payment is late or missed. You’re supposed to help build credit, not destroy it. Had it not been for my credit monitoring notification I wouldn’t have known about the missed payments. Also, let the customer know that if they try to pay off the loan and their payment doesn’t go through, that it would cancel automatic loan payments.
title: LOOK ELSEWHERE FOR A CREDIT BUILDING LOAN!

text: I was approved for $200 instacash for the first time. Then I paid off whole on my payday. Now I am eligible for only $25 cuz the app not detecting qualifying income. I can see my last direct deposit under financial section and my bank transactions. But on Under instacash income center it wasn’t updated. They should fix this bug by adding some refresh or sync option with back transactions on income center
title: Need to fix app

text: Moneylion is a fantastic financial tool I used to get my credit score higher. I used their low APR loans, made every payment on time and it helped. I had one hiccup recently, I paid off a loan.  The payment, unfortunately, didn't go through but there was no way for me to know through the app. The app said it paid off. It came up as a late remark for me on my credit report. I reached out to them and they got it fixed. I am happy overall with this product though they have raised their APRs now. Thank you Moneylion!
title: Moneylion Loans to Increase Credit

text: If I could give this company ZERO stars I would. I was apart of the government shutdown and requested that they work with me and stop payments on my loan. They agreed, and also never started back up. So now they’ve “liquidated” my investment account which takes 60 days to appear that the loan is paid off with my investment account. Now I’m sitting here almost 60 days later and I receive another email stating that they are going to “liquidate” my investment account AGAIN. You’ve already gotten they money to pay it off, I have made a report with the BBB and next will be a lawsuit if my money is touched again. This company is USELESS, DO NOT USE MONEY LION. Look up the reports on BBB and see that I am not the only one with the same complaint.
title: TOTAL SCAM

text:
Here we go again! 

Believe it or not this is the only way this company responds. This company has robbed me of money, states they are working on it and yet I never hear back! Still waiting for a deposit of 75 to my account from the beginning of March and they took 82 (includes a tip I was happy to give at the time) from my account. I’ve gotten nothing but excuses and 6, SIX different people to deal with on this matter. I’ve asked for a resolution numerous times and now have involved a lawyer. I will guarantee that they will respond to this message because of it’s negative nature and then will proceed to open yet another ticket which they will close on their own. Each time I get no response from this company I post a well deserved negative comment and they respond with apologies and we start the whole thing over again from the start. I’m done. Time to bring this company down!
